#COOTL

meta.name: Citizens of Our Time Learning Hub (COOTL)_時代公民教育平台
meta.about:
在謊言的時代拒絕遺忘，在黑暗的時代留下火種，在荒誕的時代燃點希望。為留港的下一代保存真相，為離散的港人凝聚力量，堅持普世價值，貫通全球視野，這是「時代公民教育」的使命。

Forget nothing in an age of lies.
Pass on the torch of faith in an age of darkness.
Light a candle of hope in an age of absurdity.
Save the truth for the next generations in Hong Kong.
Unite Hongkongers abroad.
Uphold universal values and global perspective.
These are the missions of Citizens of Our Time Learning Hub (COOTL).

FB: https://fb.com/cootl.hk/
IG: https://bit.ly/3iC3vvb
YouTube: https://bit.ly/3tDzdyH
